Pre-Game Insights: Utah Jazz finished the previous season with a record of 31-51 overall and 16-36 in Western Conference play. The Jazz averaged 115.7 points per game while allowing opponents to score 120.5.San Antonio Spurs finished the previous season with a record of 22-60 overall and 14-37 in Western Conference play.The Spurs averaged 15.4 points off of turnovers, 12.7 second-chance points and 39.7 bench points last season.
Others: Injuries: Jazz: Taylor Hendricks: out for season (fibula), Isaiah Collier: out (hamstring). Spurs: Devin Vassell: out (foot), Tre Jones: out (ankle).
